resources.string: The default browser will be opened automatically for downloading the video. To change your preference, open this app again and choose another browser.\n\nOpen your YouTube app and after clicking on share icon, click on icon named Youtube Download Helper for downloading the video

Welcome to Youtube Download Helper. This app helps you to download YouTube videos with the help of a website called Y2Mate, which is opened in a web browser chosen by you in the app. Close this dialog to choose your default browser and start downloading videos seamlessly.\n\nOpen your YouTube app and after clicking on share icon, click on icon named Youtube Download Helper for downloading the video.
